action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2310 withdrawn in Senate.
Motion to table amendment SA 2310 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 309.
Amendment SA 2310 proposed by Senator Thune to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2307. (consideration: CR S3276) To improve the bill.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2310 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 52. Record Vote Number: 309.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2310 proposed by Senator Thune to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2307.
